attributes.action: call a Referendum now or else call a  General Election now!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should we allow an unelected Prime Minister to deny us a Referendum? Then this Prime Minister has signed us up for Europe without knowing the will of the People; so without our mandate!
     So if no Referendum, let us have a General Election as soon as possible so that we can choose our government and Prime Minister and Democracy can be restored! A British Prime Minister who works for the British people!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
